g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;

                       , o_rt_tsl   OUT lm_ebs_timeslots%ROWTYPE )

;

                           , o_rt_tsl   OUT lm_ebs_timeslots%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

;

PROCEDURE tsl_lock_row_nowait( i_tsl_ID   IN  lm_ebs_timeslots.ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE tsl_insert_row ( io_rt_tsl  IN OUT lm_ebs_timeslots%ROWTYPE )
;

RETURN NUMBER

RETURN BOOLEAN
;

RETURN lm_ebs_timeslots.ID%TYPE
;


END lm_tsl_tapi_pck;

package body lm_tsl_tapi_pck

function tsl_select_row( i_tsl_id   in  lm_ebs_timeslots.id%type
                       , o_rt_tsl   out lm_ebs_timeslots%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tsl_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_tsl ( i_tsl_id   in  lm_ebs_timeslots.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from lm_ebs_timeslots tsl
            where tsl.id = i_tsl_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_tsl( i_tsl_id => i_tsl_id );
         fetch c_tsl into o_rt_tsl;
         l_found := c_tsl%found;
         close c_tsl;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_tsl%isopen
         then
            close c_tsl;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end tsl_select_row;

function tsl_select_row_upd( i_tsl_id   in  lm_ebs_timeslots.id%type
                           , o_rt_tsl   out lm_ebs_timeslots%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tsl_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_tsl ( i_tsl_id   in  lm_ebs_timeslots.id%type )
   is
           select *
             from lm_ebs_timeslots tsl
            where tsl.id = i_tsl_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_tsl( i_tsl_id => i_tsl_id );
   fetch c_tsl into o_rt_tsl;
   l_found := c_tsl%found;
   close c_tsl;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_tsl%isopen
      then
         close c_tsl;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end tsl_select_row_upd;

procedure tsl_lock_row( i_tsl_id   in  lm_ebs_timeslots.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tsl_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_tsl ( i_tsl_id   in  lm_ebs_timeslots.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from lm_ebs_timeslots tsl
              where tsl.id = i_tsl_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_tsl_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                tsl_lock_row_nowait( i_tsl_id => i_tsl_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_tsl( i_tsl_id => i_tsl_id );
                  close c_tsl;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_tsl%isopen
         then
            close c_tsl;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end tsl_lock_row;

procedure tsl_lock_row_nowait( i_tsl_id   in  lm_ebs_timeslots.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tsl_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_tsl ( i_tsl_id   in  lm_ebs_timeslots.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from lm_ebs_timeslots tsl
               where tsl.id = i_tsl_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_tsl_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_tsl( i_tsl_id => i_tsl_id );

            close c_tsl;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_tsl%isopen
        then
           close c_tsl;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_tsl_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end tsl_lock_row_nowait;

function tsl_perform_delete( i_tsl_id   in  lm_ebs_timeslots.id%type )
return boolean
;

procedure tsl_insert_row ( io_rt_tsl  in out lm_ebs_timeslots%rowtype )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tsl_insert_row';
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      
      begin
         insert into lm_ebs_timeslots( id
                                , lap_id
                                , open_time
                                , close_time
                                , ind_expired )
              values ( io_rt_tsl.id
                     , io_rt_tsl.lap_id
                     , io_rt_tsl.open_time
                     , io_rt_tsl.close_time
                     , io_rt_tsl.ind_expired )
           returning id
                   , lap_id
                   , open_time
                   , close_time
                   , ind_expired
                into io_rt_tsl.id
                   , io_rt_tsl.lap_id
                   , io_rt_tsl.open_time
                   , io_rt_tsl.close_time
                   , io_rt_tsl.ind_expired;

      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_insertfailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_tsl.id||'"'
                                                             ||', LAP_ID = "'||io_rt_tsl.lap_id||'"'
                                                             ||', OPEN_TIME = "'||io_rt_tsl.open_time||'"'
                                                             ||', CLOSE_TIME = "'||io_rt_tsl.close_time||'"'
                                                             ||', IND_EXPIRED = "'||io_rt_tsl.ind_expired||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end tsl_insert_row;

function tsl_perform_update( i_tsl_id   in     lm_ebs_timeslots.id%type
                           , io_rt_tsl  in out lm_ebs_timeslots%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tsl_perform_update';
begin
   
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         update lm_ebs_timeslots
            set id = io_rt_tsl.id
              , lap_id = io_rt_tsl.lap_id
              , open_time = io_rt_tsl.open_time
              , close_time = io_rt_tsl.close_time
              , ind_expired = io_rt_tsl.ind_expired
          where id = i_tsl_id
      returning id
              , lap_id
              , open_time
              , close_time
              , ind_expired
           into io_rt_tsl.id
              , io_rt_tsl.lap_id
              , io_rt_tsl.open_time
              , io_rt_tsl.close_time
              , io_rt_tsl.ind_expired;

         l_rowcount := sql%rowcount;
      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_tsl.id||'"'
                                                             ||', LAP_ID = "'||io_rt_tsl.lap_id||'"'
                                                             ||', OPEN_TIME = "'||io_rt_tsl.open_time||'"'
                                                             ||', CLOSE_TIME = "'||io_rt_tsl.close_time||'"'
                                                             ||', IND_EXPIRED = "'||io_rt_tsl.ind_expired||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount)||' rows updated' );

      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end tsl_perform_update;

function tsl_perform_delete( i_tsl_id   in  lm_ebs_timeslots.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tsl_perform_delete';
begin
   
   declare
      l_found  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         delete
           from lm_ebs_timeslots
          where id = i_tsl_id;

         l_found := sql%found;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );
      return l_found;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_tsl_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end tsl_perform_delete;

function tsl_update_row( i_tsl_id   in     lm_ebs_timeslots.id%type
                       , io_rt_tsl  in out lm_ebs_timeslots%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tsl_update_row';
begin
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         tsl_lock_row( i_tsl_id   =>  i_tsl_id );

         
         l_rowcount := 
            tsl_perform_update( i_tsl_id   =>  i_tsl_id
                              , io_rt_tsl  => io_rt_tsl );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount) ||' rows updated');
      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_tsl.id||'"'
                                                          ||', LAP_ID = "'||io_rt_tsl.lap_id||'"'
                                                          ||', OPEN_TIME = "'||io_rt_tsl.open_time||'"'
                                                          ||', CLOSE_TIME = "'||io_rt_tsl.close_time||'"'
                                                          ||', IND_EXPIRED = "'||io_rt_tsl.ind_expired||'"'                                                           , 1, 4000));
   end;                                                          
end tsl_update_row;

function tsl_delete_row( i_tsl_id   in  lm_ebs_timeslots.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tsl_delete_row';
begin
   declare
      l_deleted  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         tsl_lock_row( i_tsl_id   =>  i_tsl_id );

         
         l_deleted := tsl_perform_delete( i_tsl_id   =>  i_tsl_id );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_deleted;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_tsl_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end tsl_delete_row;

function tsl_seq1_nextval
return lm_ebs_timeslots.id%type
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.tsl_seq1_nextval';
   l_tsl_id  lm_ebs_timeslots.id%type;
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         select lm_tsl_seq1.nextval 
           into l_tsl_id
           from dual;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_tsl_id;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end tsl_seq1_nextval;


end lm_tsl_tapi_pck;
